source_title: The Art of Doing Science and Engineering: Learning to Learn
author: Richard W. Hamming and Bret Victor
text: Hamming returns to. Shannon’s information theory, continually. Einstein’s relativity. Tukey’s work on spectrum analysis and the fast Fourier transform, Grace Hopper’s work on high-level programming, Kaiser’s work on digital filters. His own error-correcting codes, of course.
